metadata.title: Week 1 Day 3: Latin Alphabet and Basic Vocabulary

prior_knowledge_digest: Students should have a basic understanding of the Latin alphabet and its pronunciation. Familiarity with the concept of discipline in learning and an introduction to the faith phrase 'In principio' are essential. Previous lessons have introduced the importance of consistent practice and the connection between Latin and English vocabulary.
yesterday_recap: Yesterday, we focused on the pronunciation of the Latin alphabet and began exploring basic vocabulary words. We also discussed the virtue of discipline and how it applies to our language studies.

primary: Students will recognize and pronounce the Latin alphabet.
Students will learn and use basic Latin vocabulary in simple sentences.
Students will connect the virtue of discipline with their study habits.

lesson_flow.description: Review the Latin alphabet and pronunciation from previous lessons.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students recite the alphabet and correct any pronunciation errors.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Focus on letters that students struggled with previously.

lesson_flow.description: Quick review of vocabulary words introduced in the last lesson.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students recall and pronounce vocabulary words with their meanings.

lesson_flow.description: Introduce new vocabulary words and their pronunciation.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students listen and repeat new vocabulary words.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Emphasize correct pronunciation and provide example phrases.

lesson_flow.description: Practice using new vocabulary in simple sentences.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students form sentences using new vocabulary words.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Provide sentence starters and assist with sentence structure.

lesson_flow.description: Discuss the faith phrase 'In principio' and its significance.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students reflect on the phrase and its meaning.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Connect the phrase to the virtue of discipline.

lesson_flow.description: Summarize the day's learning and reinforce the virtue of discipline.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students share one thing they learned and how they will apply discipline.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Encourage students to set a goal for their next study session.

behavior.loop_behavior: Reinforce correct pronunciation and usage with positive feedback.
